member.name: T:Sitecore.CES.GeoIp.IpFiltering.InlineCsvIpRangesLoader

member.para:
Stream format:
header, header, ... ip-range lo,ip-range hi[,description etc...] ip-range lo,ip-range hi[,description etc...] ip-range lo,ip-range hi[,description etc...] ip-range lo,ip-range hi[,description etc...]
